meanings.definition: A member of the order Acarina, which includes mites and ticks.
meanings.sent1: The acaridans scurried across the forest floor, searching for food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study acaridans to learn more about their behavior and habitats.
meanings.sent3: The acaridans decided to throw a tiny party under the oak tree.
meanings.sent4: The acaridans multiplied rapidly, spreading like a tiny army.
meanings.sent5: In the world of acaridans, survival of the fittest is the golden rule.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of acarids.
meanings.sent1: The acaridans infestation caused a lot of trouble for the homeowners.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the acaridans population in urban areas.
meanings.sent3: The acaridans dance party was the talk of the tiny town.
meanings.sent4: The acaridans invasion painted the fields with a blanket of red.
meanings.sent5: The acaridans presence was unmistakable in the dusty corners of the old barn.
